chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y

Premises:
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : Z; Qden : positive } For Qmake: Argument scopes are [Z_scope positive_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
dicho_comp : forall (x y : R) (P : R -> bool) (n : nat), x <= y -> dicho_lb x y P n <= dicho_up x y P n
locally_locally : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
dicho_lb = fun (x y : R) (P : R -> bool) (N : nat) => Dichotomy_lb x y P N : R -> R -> (R -> bool) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope nat_scope]
dicho_up = fun (x y : R) (P : R -> bool) (N : nat) => Dichotomy_ub x y P N : R -> R -> (R -> bool) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope nat_scope]
Dichotomy_ub = fix Dichotomy_lb (x y : R) (P : R -> bool) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => x | S n => let down := Dichotomy_lb x y P n in let up := Dichotomy_ub x y P n in let z := (down + up) / 2 in if P z then down else z end with Dichotomy_ub (x y : R) (P : R -> bool) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => y | S n => let down := Dichotomy_lb x y P n in let up := Dichotomy_ub x y P n in let z := (down + up) / 2 in if P z then z else up end for Dichotomy_ub : R -> R -> (R -> bool) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope nat_scope]
Dichotomy_lb = fix Dichotomy_lb (x y : R) (P : R -> bool) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => x | S n => let down := Dichotomy_lb x y P n in let up := Dichotomy_ub x y P n in let z := (down + up) / 2 in if P z then down else z end with Dichotomy_ub (x y : R) (P : R -> bool) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => y | S n => let down := Dichotomy_lb x y P n in let up := Dichotomy_ub x y P n in let z := (down + up) / 2 in if P z then z else up end for Dichotomy_lb : R -> R -> (R -> bool) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope nat_scope]
point_adherent = fun (D : R -> Prop) (x : R) => forall V : R -> Prop, neighbourhood V x -> exists y : R, intersection_domain V D y : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax_left : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
D_x = fun (D : R -> Prop) (y x : R) => D x /\ y <> x : (R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Record Metric_Space : Type := Build_Metric_Space { Base : Type; dist : Base -> Base -> R; dist_pos : forall x y : Base, dist x y >= 0; dist_sym : forall x y : Base, dist x y = dist y x; dist_refl : forall x y : Base, dist x y = 0 < -> x = y; dist_tri : forall x y z : Base, dist x y <= dist x z + dist z y } For Build_Metric_Space: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
locally_singleton : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> P x where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0%nat => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Argument scope is [nat_scope]
atan = fun x : R => let (v, _) := pre_atan x in v : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
Rmax_case_strong : forall (r1 r2 : R) (P : R -> Type), (r2 <= r1 -> P r1) -> (r1 <= r2 -> P r2) -> P (Rmax r1 r2)
Rmax_comm : forall x y : R, Rmax x y = Rmax y x
Rmin_comm : forall x y : R, Rmin x y = Rmin y x
Zeq_bool = fun x y : Z => match (x ?= y)%Z with | Eq => true | _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
derive_pt : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f x -> R
Rbar_le = fun x y : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => match y with | Finite y0 => x0 <= y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match y with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
